content: * i have wanted for a long time now to knit a sweater scarf with sleeves and finally got the time to do it i wanted it to be a soft chunky dream therefore i chose this halaus yarn for it halaus means hug in finnish and that word really describes this yarn perfectly * this pattern is available for **free** in **english / suomeksi** the scarf with sleeves is a combination of a scarf and a sweater and is designed to be worn wrapped around the shoulders the piece begins with working the other sleeve on dpns in the round then stitches will be added to the work and the scarf part is worked flat back and forth with circular needle lace knit and an i-cord edge lastly stitches will be decreased from the work and the other sleeve will be worked on dpns the same way as in the beginning the length and width of the piece can be adjusted by working less or more lace patterns depending on the desired size for the piece **size ** one size adjustable lengthwise **length of piece ** approx 250 cm / 98 42 **width of piece ** approx 45 cm / 17 71 **cuff circumference ** approx 22 cm / 8 66 **cuff length ** approx 30 cm / 11 81 **yarn ** novita halaus chunky 40 % cotton / 35 % alpaca / 25 % wool 1 skein = 50 g = approx 100 m / 109 yds 5171 utu approx 450 g **needles ** dpns size 5 mm us 8 or size needed to obtain gauge circular needle size 5 5 mm us 9 length 80 cm 32 or size needed to obtain gauge **other materials ** tapestry needle **gauge ** 13 sts x 22 row in stockinette stitch / 15 sts x 24 row in lace knit with size 5 5 us 9 needles = 10 cm 4 x 4 * olen
